title: yahoo62278
author: yahoo62278
content: I am opening the bounty group back up. If you are interested in joining, pm me for the link and i'll start letting people join. I will be launching a bounty later today, so that's why I am deciding to open the group again. Try to act professional and not post when moon or silly stuff please.

comments.author: johnsaributua
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on October 26, 2023, 01:32:56 PMI am opening the bounty group back up. If you are interested in joining, pm me for the link and i'll start letting people join. I will be launching a bounty later today, so that's why I am deciding to open the group again. Try to act professional and not post when moon or silly stuff please.link like this sir?https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=990637;sa=summaryif I ask the opening for paid btc or altcoin participants sir? considering you post on the service board, please apologize for my impudence.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: johnsaributua on October 26, 2023, 01:47:09 PMQuote from: yahoo62278 on October 26, 2023, 01:32:56 PMI am opening the bounty group back up. If you are interested in joining, pm me for the link and i'll start letting people join. I will be launching a bounty later today, so that's why I am deciding to open the group again. Try to act professional and not post when moon or silly stuff please.link like this sir?https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=990637;sa=summaryif I ask the opening for paid btc or altcoin participants sir? considering you post on the service board, please apologize for my impudence.It's a group on telegram where users can ask questions about bounties I may be conducting. There is no pay. Just a group for convenience.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: It'll be nice to be a part of the group and also being a part of the group will give first hand access to getting updates on the projects and also applications, mostly on projects with 'First come first serve' conditions.I already sent you a DM

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on October 26, 2023, 01:32:56 PMI am opening the bounty group back up. If you are interested in joining, pm me for the link and i'll start letting people join. I will be launching a bounty later today, so that's why I am deciding to open the group again. Try to act professional and not post when moon or silly stuff please.I have been trying to search for a group of yours bearing your name on Telegram, Mr. yahoo62278 for years. Unfortunately, no results appeared regarding the existence of a group or channel of yours. It is good that this group has been created now, as it will be helpful for participants to ask any questions related to the bounties you run and discussions and see updates about your campaigns and the weekly payments. You can pin the most frequently asked questions and answers to the pinned messages at the top of the group instead of these participants spamming your PMs with duplicate messages that you have already answered.I will send you a DM shortly.

comments.author: rahim066
comments.body: it will be a good experiance joining your group i already DMed you

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on October 26, 2023, 01:32:56 PMI am opening the bounty group back up. If you are interested in joining, pm me for the link and i'll start letting people join. I will be launching a bounty later today, so that's why I am deciding to open the group again. Try to act professional and not post when moon or silly stuff please.I have already sent you the DM and will wait for you to send me the bounty group link.By the way, why don't you share the group link here publically and those who want to join will do it without having you PM to the individuals?Secondly, when is your bounty coming?

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on October 27, 2023, 02:49:48 PMQuote from: yahoo62278 on October 26, 2023, 01:32:56 PMI am opening the bounty group back up. If you are interested in joining, pm me for the link and i'll start letting people join. I will be launching a bounty later today, so that's why I am deciding to open the group again. Try to act professional and not post when moon or silly stuff please.I have already sent you the DM and will wait for you to send me the bounty group link.By the way, why don't you share the group link here publically and those who want to join will do it without having you PM to the individuals?Secondly, when is your bounty coming?If I wanted the link public, I would have shared it. IMO if I have people send a pm for the link and make them join, it shows they might be active and will participate vs bot bot bot bot bot blah blah ya know? Trying to weed out the worthless so to speak.I thought I had already replied to everyone who send a pm, i'll look again. Bounty will launch a little later today.

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: I've always been interested in groups managed by professional managers. So add me to your group @yahoo62278 I will stay in your group and maybe join some suitable bounties. I will DM my telegram id

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: I am interested in joining the group . I will be sending you my TG id right now .
